Title: The Magic of the Golden Bear: Goldy III
Actors: Cheech Marin, Mr. T, Bonnie Morgan
Plot: When a sly magician casts a spell so that he can buy Goldy, the last Golden Bear, Jesse runs away with her pet. Hiding deep in the heart of the forest, the youngster meets a 'Ghostman' who believes all animals should be free. In HD.
